resources.string: {\"quiz\":{\"quiz_id\":\"4567\",\"quiz_name\":\"Bird Colors Quiz\",\"access_key\":\"key2\"},\"questions\":[{\"question_text\":\"What color is a canary?\",\"choices\":[{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"Red\",\"correct\":false}},{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"Yellow\",\"correct\":true}},{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"Blue\",\"correct\":false}}]},{\"question_text\":\"What color is a raven?\",\"choices\":[{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"Black\",\"correct\":true}},{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"Orange\",\"correct\":false}},{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"Purple\",\"correct\":false}}]},{\"question_text\":\"What color is a bluejay?\",\"choices\":[{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"Green\",\"correct\":false}},{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"Red\",\"correct\":false}},{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"Blue\",\"correct\":true}}]},{\"question_text\":\"What color is a cardinal?\",\"choices\":[{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"Red\",\"correct\":true}},{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"Grey\",\"correct\":false}},{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"Brown\",\"correct\":false}}]},{\"question_text\":\"What color is a dove?\",\"choices\":[{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"Blue\",\"correct\":false}},{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"White\",\"correct\":true}},{\"choice\":{\"text\":\"Yellow\",\"correct\":false}}]}]}
